channel.title: Data Journal
channel.description: Exploring reproducible finance with the R statistical computing environment.

item.title: R for Health Data Analysis - An Introduction
item.dc:creator: Jubayer Hossain
item.description: In this article, you will learn about R programming and it's application in the field of statistics, data analytics, data science, genomic data science and bioinformatics research.

item.title: R for Health Data Analysis - R Objects
item.dc:creator: Jubayer Hossain
item.description: In this article, you will learn about 5 basic or "atomic" R classes of objects. Such as Numeric(real numbers), Integer, Complex, Character and Logical(True or False)

item.title: R for Health Data Analysis - Variables and Reserved Words
item.dc:creator: Jubayer Hossain
item.description: In this article, you will learn about what are variables?, how to create them? the naming convention of varibales in R programming. I'll also mention some reserved keywords which can not be a variable name.
